description: Elon Musk has declared that “civil war is inevitable” in Keir Starmer’s Britain. A government minister called his comments “pretty deplorable.”
title: Elon Musk says U.K. government, not social media, to blame for violence

description: Maybe you could choose a Google-quality search engine tailored to children or news. Or would Android, Google search and Chrome be split up?
title: 6 ways the Google antitrust ruling could change the internet

description: TikTok Lite is removing a rewards program in E.U. countries after regulators accused the company of creating addictive features that could harm children.
title: TikTok to remove feature for some users after E.U. says it’s addictive

description: Elon Musk closes X offices in San Francisco, ending a fraught chapter between the billionaire and the city. Musk has long threatened to leave the city, citing its progressive politics and struggles with homelessness.
title: Elon Musk moves X out of San Francisco. City leaders shrug.
